deck.description: A deck as defined in the decks_schema

locations.description: A list of locations objects. Each one of them defined by the slot name and a list of wells

slot_name.description: Label that references a labware in the deck
slot_name.restriction: The slot name must match the label given to an existing labware in a slot in the deck

wells.description: A list of wells, ranging from A1 to the maximum row and column defined in the labware
wells.restriction: The string has the format %c%d with char ranging from A to the maximum row  allows by the labware (H in case of 96 well plates) followed by an integer ranging from 1 to maximum column (12 in case of 96 well plates)

steps.description: A list of step objects as described in the steps_schema, the robot will execute each step of this list in order

liquid_classes.description: Liquid class object that act as transfer step modifiers
